title: Social determinants of health extraction from clinical notes across institutions using large language models
details: VK Keloth, S Selek, Q Chen, C Gilman, S Fu, Y Dang… - npj Digital Medicine, 2025
abstract: Detailed social determinants of health (SDoH) is often buried within clinical text in EHRs. Most current NLP efforts for SDoH have limitations, investigating limited factors, deriving data from a single institution, using specific patient cohorts/note …

title: Aligning large language models with human preferences using historical text edits
details: J Majkutewicz, J Szymański - Knowledge-Based Systems, 2025
abstract: Aligning large language models with human values (to be helpful, harmless, honest) requires high-quality, comprehensive human preference datasets. However, the substantial cost of creating such datasets often limits their size and scope, hindering …

title: Llavidal: A large language vision model for daily activities of living
details: D Reilly, R Chakraborty, A Sinha, MK Govind, P Wang… - Proceedings of the IEEE …, 2025
abstract: Abstract Current Large Language Vision Models (LLVMs) trained on web videos perform well in general video understanding but struggle with fine-grained details, complex humanobject interactions (HOI), and view-invariant representation learning …
